definition: rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: IR2172 is a current sensing IC presented by International Rectifier Company.
sentences.chinese: IR2172是國際整流器公司推出的電流傳感芯片。

sentences.english: The rectifier is supplied by the normal AC input.
sentences.chinese: 整流器是所提供的正常交流輸入。

sentences.english: Diffused junction type silicon diode, 1,0A ultrahigh-speed rectifier.
sentences.chinese: 擴散結型硅二極管，1，0一個超高速整流器。

sentences.english: One of the key factors of affecting power factor of rectifiers is control technique.
sentences.chinese: 控制技術是影響整流器功率因數的關鍵因素之一。

sentences.english: The two ends of the wire are connected to a split-ring commutator.
sentences.chinese: 導線的兩端聯接到裂環整流器。

sentences.english: A power supply is connected to a line connecting the rectifier with the inverter.
sentences.chinese: 電源聯接到整流器和逆變器的連接線上。

sentences.english: Vacuum rectifiers are characterized by the following.
sentences.chinese: 真空管整流器具有如下的特性。

sentences.english: Rectifiers are the critical components in a smelter potline .
sentences.chinese: 整流器是熔爐電解槽中的關鍵組成部分。

sentences.english: Rectifiers are devices that convert alternating current (AC) to direct current (DC).
sentences.chinese: 整流器是一種將交流電轉換爲直流電的儀器。

sentences.english: The study on simulation model of 12-pulse transformation rectifier with equilibrium reactor was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了帶均衡電抗器的12脈波變壓整流器仿真模型。

sentences.english: A new control scheme of three phase voltage source PWM rectifier is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種新的三相電壓型PWM整流器控制方案。

sentences.english: Check the rectifier and extremely Yin and Yang, timely to be rectified.
sentences.chinese: 檢查整流器與陰陽極，適時予以修正。

sentences.english: Check the filter degree meets the standards, if offset should be rectifier repair.
sentences.chinese: 檢查濾波度是否符合標準，若偏移時須將整流器送修。

sentences.english: Assume that the rectifier or power supply produces an output voltage which has a peak value of 20 volts.
sentences.chinese: 假定整流器或電源產生一個輸出電壓有20伏的峯值。

definition: to rectify (alternating current to direct current)
abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
